attacks.name: Fast Raid
attacks.effect: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.

attacks.name: Cruel Spike
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Beauty-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
